  "Broker Comment" : "Approximately 14 years after investing into an approved hedge fund that I started in 2002, my firm was named in an arbitration based on the primary fact that the hedge declined in value in 2008-2009, during the worst financial crisis in 70 years. My individual contribution to the settlement was zero dollars."
